General.Name: Medovex Corp
General.Description: H-CYTE, Inc., a medical bioscience company that  develops technology in regenerative medicine for limb salvage. It also developing immunotherapies for ovarian cancer, pancreatic cancer, and mesothelioma. The company is headquartered in Tampa, Florida.
General.Address: 2202 North West Shore Boulevard, Tampa, FL, United States, 33607
